channel.title: How Do I Add Bonus's To My Custom Items?
channel.description: How Do I Add Strength Or Other Bonus's To My Custom Items? Please HELP![br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 02, 2009, 08:57:12 pm[/size][hr]ugh, no reply..:(

item.title: How Do I Add Bonus's To My Custom Items?
item.dc:creator: @locksmin locksmin
item.description:
@locksmin wrote:

Benan-96:

How Do I Add Strength Or Other Bonus’s To My Custom Items? Please HELP![br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 02, 2009, 08:57:12 pm[/size][hr]ugh, no reply…

Go to item.cfg and look for your item name then on the right side should be numbers of 0’s or random numbers change the 3rd number thourgh out the whole rest of them to the bonus you want them to be.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Add Bonus's To My Custom Items?

item.title: How Do I Add Bonus's To My Custom Items?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

aurisdj:

i hope i helped…

You probably didn’t…

Inside item.cfg, there are 15 for each item, the second from last number is the strength bonus. It’s as easy as that. And if your custom item isn’t already in the item.cfg file, simply add it.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Add Bonus's To My Custom Items?

item.title: How Do I Add Bonus's To My Custom Items?
item.dc:creator: @aurisdj aurisdj
item.description:
@aurisdj wrote:

umm to cosutom items i dont really know but you can try the item.cfg file
go to item.cfg
look for an item u want to make better bigger str bonus and stuff…
ex. perfect ring it will say something like 496.349235479 and you cange everything to what you want you item to give like it might say 0 so change to 10000 or 100 or anything u want i hope i helped…
